statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 100 AND location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM customer_behavior WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type
SELECT customer_id, location_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND behavior_type IN ('click', 'purchase') ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_score FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, behavior_score FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score > 70;
SELECT * FROM MarketingMessages ORDER BY message_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM Customers WHERE behavior_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT message_content FROM MarketingMessages WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_score FROM Customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York' ORDER BY behavior_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, behavior_score FROM Customers WHERE customer_location LIKE '%LA%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, behavior_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, location_id FROM customers WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM customers c JOIN locations l ON c.location_id = l.location_id;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN customer_interactions ci ON c.customer_id = ci.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location_name, city, state FROM customers JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers, location_id FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_customers > 5 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, location_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC;
SELECT message_content, send_date FROM marketing_messages WHERE target_customer_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-9abc-def012345678';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, province FROM customers INNER JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE province = 'Ontario';
SELECT customer_name, message_content, send_date FROM customers INNER JOIN marketing_messages ON customers.customer_id = marketing_messages.target_customer_id ORDER BY send_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, location_id FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, location_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, sent_timestamp FROM marketing_messages WHERE sent_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE location_id=1;
SELECT name, location_id FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT name, location_name FROM customer_profiles JOIN locations ON customer_profiles.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT message_text, sent_timestamp FROM marketing_messages WHERE sent_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sent_timestamp DESC;
